product_name: ALPS Mountaineering Lightweight Air Pad - Extra Large - Special Buy
long_description: When you're away from home on a camping trip and want some added comfort to your cot or sleeping bag, try the self-inflating, extra-large ALPS Mountaineering Lightweight Air Pad. Top fabric is tough, lightweight ripstop fabric and the bottom is polyester taffeta. Pad will inflate and deflate quickly with the jet stream foam, and roll up compactly to fit into the stuff sack. Extra-large size includes 2 valves for fast inflating. Stuff sack, compression straps and repair kit are included with the ALPS Mountaineering Lightweight Air Pad. Special buy.
short_description: When you're away from home on a camping trip and want some added comfort to your cot or sleeping bag, try the self-inflating, extra-large ALPS Mountaineering Lightweight Air Pad.
